verbose_text: To determine whether the expression vectors induced gene expression in vitro, and to gain information on the sub-cellular localization of T-bet, GATA-3 and TGF-beta expression following transfection, fluorescence microscopy of cells transfected with T-bet, GATA-3 and TGF-beta-encoding plasmids that were fused to red fluorescent protein (RFP) was carried out.
